DLG 10
We will dance the night away!

DLG 11
We're so proud of you!

DLG 12
It's fine if you're not impressed!

DLG 14
They're not expecting you.

DLG 15
They're waiting for you.

DLG 18
Oh you definitely don't want to go this way, trust me.

DLG a
I'm a cat

DLG f
Sometimes I worry that these attendants make me look fat.

DLG g
This place is a bit of a mess, but to be honest I kind of like it that way.

DLG h
Woah, getting a bit close for comfort there friend.

DLG i
It's no secret that respecting personal space is important!

DLG l
We love playing video games.

DLG m
Videogames are the greatest.

DLG n
Everyone we know plays video games because they're cool and fun.

DLG o
We're cool and fun so we play videogames.

DLG r
infactithinkimightbetalkingabittoofastyouseeitsbeenalongtimesinceweveseenanyonenew!!!!

DLG s
its nice to meet you howdo youdo itsso nicetomeetyouitsreallynice

DLG t
haha you're not supposed to beherebecausewe'reveryeexcitable

DLG u
wowowowo welcome to here!!!!!!!

DLG A
You've seen through our clever ruse! This was all a show just for you!

DLG x
You've seen through our clever ruse!

DLG 1a
They're anticipating you.

DLG y
This was all a show just for you!

DLG z
Let us all dance in celebration!

DLG j
I'm going to let you in on a secret: they're not a cat.

DLG p
Do you play video games?

DLG q
Do you play videogames?

DLG v
oh! ummm- you're not supposed to be here...

DLG w
h-hello?????????? h-ho-how are you?????????????????????????????????????????today??????????????

END 0
Yeah, I agree. Let's leave these folks alone with their secrets!

END undefined
The secret was that he actually wanted you to kiss him but got too nervous. He should have just told you!

END undefinee
The secret is that they're trying to drive you away by acting weird. You did barge into their social circle after all, you weirdo!

END undefinef
The secret is that the only game they've ever played is E.T. for Atari.

END undefineg
Secrets were revealed and fun was had, but the dancing can only go on for so long!

END undefineh
